Name: Amanda's Magic Book 4: True Love
About the game: Amanda and Prince Charlie have gone through a lot together, but they don’t always see eye-to-eye. When a furious argument results in them being pulled into a book of fairy tales, they find themselves caught up in a fairy tale gone wrong. At a sinister castle, a cursed Beast takes Amanda prisoner while his servants hope they will find true love. In this magical Match-3 game, a Amanda joins forces with Charlie in order to save her father. Game Features: -Another light-hearted story about Amanda and Prince Charlie, as they once again find themselves caught in the pages of a book. -5 chapters and 20 upgrades repair the classic tale piece by piece through Amanda’s efforts. -Dazzling Match-3 puzzles to solve to help the characters along their path. -Experience a fairy tale retold as Amanda and Charlie’s presence sends the story off of its intended path.
